text: â€˜â€˜Allahvait tavira marravaraiya (enkalukkum unkalukkum itaiyil) tirppalikkum atipatiyaka nan etuttukkolven? Avantan ella viparankalumulla ivvetattai unkalukku arul purintirukkinran'' (enru napiye! Nir kuruviraka. Itarku munnar) evarkalukku nam vetam kotuttirukkinromo avarkal, itu meyyakave umatu iraivanitamiruntu unmaiyaik konte arulappattullatu enpatai urutiyaka arivarkal. Akave, cantekappatupavarkalil nirum oruvaraka orupotum akivitaventam
